comments.body: You need to add the `extra/maintainer` section here. See https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/blob/master/recipes/example/meta.yaml#L41-L45 for an example.
Thanks, this is done and all automated checks are passing now

@@ -1,1 +41,45 @@    codebase to support both Python 2 and Python 3 with minimal overhead.
